resources.string: Welcome to VplanPlus! The onboarding process will help you connect to your schools stundenplan24 instance.
It\'s an eight-digit number provided by your school.
That school id does not exist.
Enter your username (probably \'schueler\') and password. These credentials are provided by your institute.
Couldn\'t establish a connection to the server. Please check your internet connection.
Depending on your role at school you\'ll need to choose wether you want to see the data for teachers or students. Don\'t worry, you can still search for the other one later.
Choose this profile if you want to see the plan for a class by default. If you\'re a parent, choose this profile too.
If you\'re a teacher, choose this profile.
If you need to add multiple classes, you can do so by creating a new profile in settings.
Do you want to delete profile \'%1$s\'?
You can\'t delete the last existing profile for this school
Find your acronym. If you want to see your class as well, you can add another profile in settings later.
Choose this profile to view the schedules for a specific room at your school.
Here you can select a room that has been found at your school.

Sometimes, the base data of your school isn\'t up to date. The app will automatically add your acronym once there\'s some data about you. For now, select another profile and download this weeks data. If you\'re teaching some lessons this week, you can add yourself in the settings.
There is a new plan for %1$s at %2$s available (%3$s)
You won\'t receive any notifications if there are any changes to the plan.
Show notifications when app is in foreground
When disabled, you\'ll only get notifications for plan changes, when the app isn\'t visible.
Enjoy your weekend! Recharge and return on Monday with renewed energy for a productive week ahead. üåü
The weekend is almost here! üéâ Recharge and look forward to a relaxing break.
The weekend has come to a close. Wishing you a smooth start to the week ahead! ‚òïÔ∏è
Search for teachers, rooms and classes
Here you can have a quick peek at other plan views. If you need to talk to a specific teacher, you can search for him here.
To see the room occupancy map of another school, change your active profile.
Rename your profile to something you can recognize better. Keep yourself short to optimize readability when there\'s a profile icon. Clear text to reset its name to default.
The app will create an event that starts at your first lesson and ends at your last lesson every day.
This will create a calendar event for every single lesson.
If you want to receive notifications when there is a new plan for you available, grand access to the app.
There aren\'t any calendars on your system
If there are lessons that don\'t affect you, you can unselect them here so you won\'t get notified about changes regarding these lessons.
This profile does not match with the default lessons of its class. Fixing the problem will reset these settings. This can happen after a new timetable was released.

For this day, there is no data available. Either your school hasn\'t released a substitution plan for this day, or it\'s too far in the future. You can change the number of days to sync after today in the settings.
You don\'t have to go to school today. Feel free to meet friends or tidy up your room.
There is a change in plan for %1$s at %2$s for %3$s

Your school has disabled accessing the list of teachers and rooms with the current account. You might get incomplete search results. Consider using a teacher account. If you don\'t have access to such one, you\'re out of luck. You\'ll still be able to use the basic features of this app.
Because your school isn\'t fully supported, there might be some rooms and teachers missing. They get added when they are involved in a time table.
Notififications for new plans and plan changes
News about the app, current problems and more
There was an error when trying to connect to the test school
Do you really want to cancel the onboarding process? You can come back any time when you want to set up the app.
Experimental features and debug options. Use with caution.
Track network requests and other data
We\'re just getting some things ready for you.
"That might take some time. Please be patient.\nThank you for choosing VPlanPlus. If there are any issues, report them on GitHub. "

This deletes the data that originates from the Internet. This data can then be downloaded again. If incorrect data is displayed, deleting the app cache can help.
\nThis will be removed from the device:
\n- Timetable data
\n- Room bookings
\n- Grades
\n- Cloud homework
This can help if the cache is corrupted.
Scan this qr while onboarding. Please only pass this qr on to authorized persons.
Please make sure that the qr is clearly visible

"Do you want to book this room from %1$s to %2$s for class %3$s?\n\nPlease note that this might be not official at your school. The instructions of teachers and planning staff must be followed. This is just an orientation. Make sure that you don't book rooms you're not permitted to enter on your own. "
VPlanPlus doesn\'t have permission to edit your calendar. Do you want to grant this permission now?
You need a vpp.ID to verify that you belong to a class in order to use certain features of the app. You\'ll be authenticated with your beste.schule or notenbuch.online account.
Do you already have a vpp.ID or do you want to create a new one?
You can now use all features of %1$s in class %2$s.
Do you really want to logout, %1$s? You wont be able to use the extended feature set anymore.
Something went wrong. You\'re not logged out yet.
You need to connect your vpp.ID in order to book a room. This is to prevent spam. You can create one using your beste.schule or notenbuch.online account. Visit the settings page to learn more.
You need to use a student profile in order to book a room.
There was a conflict with another existing booking.
%1$s booked this room for class %2$s from %3$s until %4$s
%1$s booked room %2$s for this canceled lesson
The room booking was canceled successfully
This booking wasn\'t found. It might be canceled already.
There\'s no data for your next school day. Don\'t worry, we\'ll notify you when there\'s a new plan available.
There\'s no data available at the moment. You can enable this feaure later.
No vpp.ID found. You need to have one in order for the app to get your grades.
This profile doesn\'t have a vpp.ID connected to it. However, there is at least one vpp.ID found in the app. Switch to a profile, that has a vpp.ID connected to it so we can display your grades.
You didn\'t allow the app to talk to beste.schule or notenbuch.online. If you enabled it already, try reconnecting your existing vpp.ID.

The averages are calculated based on the data as seen here. The average for a subject is calculated by taking the average of the average of each category. Your school or your teachers might take a different approach on how to get the final grade.
Create a notification when a new grade is published in beste.schule or notenbuch.online.
We didn\'t find any grades. Maybe there aren\'t any available at the moment. You can run a sync to get the latest data.
VPlanPlus will never get your actual password, instead, we receive a token from beste.schule to authenticate you.
Get notified when someone in your class books a room
You need to re-link your vpp.ID
Tap on a session to close it. This cannot be undone.
If enabled, all classmates who have also activated %1$s with %2$s enabled will see this homework.
If enabled, all classmates who have also activated %1$s without a teacher will see this homework.
If enabled, all classmates will see this homework.
You can\'t share this homework with your classmates because you\'re not logged in to vpp.ID.
You need a vpp.ID to save your homework online and share it with your classmates. Go to settings, to log in. If you decide, not to log in, you can still save homework locally on your device.
Please select a class profile to use this feature.
Do you really want to delete this homework? All of its tasks will be deleted as well.
Are you sure you want to delete this homework? It will be deleted for your classmates as well!
Are you sure you want to delete this homework?
This will notify your classmates about the new homework. Your progress won\'t be shared.
Undo sharing this homework with your classmates?
This is generally not advised. Only do this when you shared the homework by accident. This homework won\'t be visible for your classmates anymore.
Do you really want to delete the task %1$s? If this homework is shared, it\'ll get updated for all your classmates.
Change the content of this task. If this homework is shared, it\'ll be updated on your classmates devices too.
When someone shared or changed a homework in your class you\'ll get a notification.
%1$s created a homework in %2$s with %3$d tasks due to %4$s
Your homework wasn\'t saved. Please try again.
An internet connection is required to save this homework to your vpp.ID.
Make sure you\'re connected to the internet and try again.
The visibility of this homework couldn\'t be changed.
The task couldn\'t be added to the homework. You can copy it to your clipboard though.
Couldn\'t change task. You can still copy its values to the clipboard.
There is no homework available for you. Enjoy the moment!
Some subjects aren\'t available because you disabled them in your Profile. You cannot create a homework in those subjects unless you enable them in profile settings.
If disabled, this homework will only be saved locally. There is now way to move it to the cloud later on.
App version, support and bug reporting
No vpp.ID linked to this class. Click here to login.
This grade will be added to %1$s locally. It\'ll be deleted, once you close this screen.
Here you can quickly calculate your average grade by adding or removing grades to each category. The final grade is the average of all averages per category. You can remove a grade by tapping on it,
You\'ve activated biometric authentication for your grades, but didn\'t set up any fingerprints or your face
Your device reported, that it supports biometric authentication. You can protect your grades with your fingerprint or face id.
You\'ll be asked next time for biometric authentication.
Authenticate yourself to see your grades.
Secure your grades with your fingerprint or face.
You need to authenticate yourself to disable protection.
Only do this for testing purposes. Changing the default server might result in an inconsistent data set. After you set a new server, the app will close itself.
Show notification when someone created a new homework
You can turn off notifications about new homework and rely on your daily reminders. However, you might lose track about homework created after your reminder when this is turned off.
You\'ll get a notification if there are undone tasks until tomorrow. Currently set to %1$s.
Get a notification reminding you of undone tasks until tomorrow.

You can set custom times for the reminder for specific days. If the day is marked with a color, the exception for this day is active. Tap a time to change it or tap a day to en- or disable its exception.
There are some unfinished tasks left

plurals.name: notification_homeworkReminderTomorrowMessage
plurals.item: There is one unfinished homework assignment in %2$s that is due to tomorrow
There are %1$d unfinished homework assignments in subjects %2$s that are due to tomorrow

resources.string: Now you can choose if you want to get notified the moment a new homework is created. Additionally, the app can remind you at your preferred time about unfinished homework.
You need to allow the app to create alarms. They do not wake you up, but they allow the app to build a notification for you. This is required to use this feature.
Get help, report a bug or suggest a feature
Write your message to the developers
This will send some metadata like your Android an app version along with the message. This data can be very helpful to identify and fix bugs.
Add an email address to be able to receive responses on your messages.
The feedback must be at least 10 characters long.
The message couldn\'t been sent. Please try again.
A new version of VPlanPlus got installed
You\'re up and running with version %1$s, here is what\'s changed:
By using this app, you agree to the
We tried our best, but \'%1$s\' wasn\'t found anywhere.
There\'s no data for %1$s available yet. We\'ll notify you shortly after something changed.
Weekend is over, but another one is coming soon.

plurals.name: timetable_weekendFutureThisWeek
plurals.item: The weekend is coming up. Just one day left.
The weekend is coming up. Just %1$d days left.

resources.string: The weekend is coming. Just keep on going.
There\'s no data for %1$s anymore. VPlanPlus deletes old data automatically to avoid using up too much of that precious space.
Go to App-Info -> Permissions to allow this.
Some older versions of Android don\'t support system-wide darkmode. If you prefer you can force darkmode here.
If you\'re not receiving real time notifications, you can try to re-authenticate your device with vpp.ID servers.
The token was updated successfully. You should get realtime notifications from now on.
An error occurred while updating the fcm token. Check your network connection and try again.
That\'s taking longer than expected. Hold on‚Ä¶
There is no school on this day.
Hides finished lessons in home screen so you can focus on the remaining ones.

Try to sync every %1$d minutes. The minimum is 15 minutes. Please do note, that this can vary very wide depending on your system settings like battery and or data saver modes. VPlanPlus normally tries to sync based on server events in real time. Changes will be applied after the app starts the next time.

This will turn off the scheduled sync. You\'ll still receive new data via Firebase Cloud Messaging, but if it fails, VPlanPlus will never automatically sync on its own. Only disable sync if you really have problems with it.
You were logged out of your vpp.ID. The account has been removed from this device. Please log back in to continue to use vpp.ID features.
You didn\'t select a subject. This homework won\'t be visible for users with an older version (v1.1 and prior) of the app. Do you want to continue?
This data might be incomplete as recent changes might not be represented in substitution plans. Bookings are not officially recognized by the school.
Your beste.schule Account is linked to class %1$s but it does not exist at your school. This can happen especially in JG11 and JG12 classes. Contact us so we can fix it for you.
Starting with version v1.2.2, you need to link a vpp.ID to a profile in order to use it. This can be done in settings.
No Profiles for class %1$s found. Please create one.
Select profiles which should be linked to this vpp.ID. This is required to use vpp.ID functionality when a selected profile is active.
This vpp.ID is automatically connected to profile %1$s.
There are no suitable profiles for class %1$s on this device right now. You\'ll need to create a new profile for this class and link your vpp.ID to it afterwards.
Select at least one profile. Your vpp.ID will be linked to them. This can be changed later.
